鮠字的基本解释

鮠
wéi
〔鮠鱼〕体前部平扁，后部侧扁，浅灰色，无鳞，眼小，口有四对须，尾分叉，身长可达三四尺。生活于江河中。

鮠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》五灰切，平灰，疑。］
(1)鱼名。也称鮰鱼、鱯鱼、鱼。
(2)鱼纲鮠科中的鮠属鱼。身体前部平扁，后部侧扁，长可三四尺，浅灰色，无鳞，眼小，须四对，尾鳍分叉。产长江流域。

鮠字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮠； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1469第07
【廣韻】五灰切【集韻】吾回切，?音嵬。魚名。似鮎。【類篇】鯷之小者。【本草圖經】鮧魚口小背黃腹白，名鮠。【正字通】鮠似鮎而大，白色，背有肉鬐，秦人呼爲獺魚。

鮠字的源字形

暂无。

鮠
Basic explanation of words
鮠
wéi
〔鮠鱼〕The front part of the body is flat, the back part is flat, light gray, without scales, small eyes, four pairs of whiskers in the mouth, bifurcated tail, and the body length can reach three or four feet. Live in the river.
鮠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guangyun" five-ash cut, flat gray, suspicious. ]
(1) The name of the fish. Also known as catfish, catfish, and fish.
(2) Fishes of the genus Cichlid in the family Cichlidae. The front of the body is flat and flat, and the back is flat. It can be three or four feet long, light gray, without scales, small eyes, four pairs of whiskers, and caudal fin bifurcated. Produce the Yangtze River Basin.
鮠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮠; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1469 Page 07
[Guang Yun] Five Ash Cut [Ji Yun] I cut back,? Yinwei. The name of the fish. Like catfish. 【Classes】The small one. [This sketch scripture] The small fish mouth has a yellow back and a white belly, and its name is 鮧. [Zhengzitong] The 鮠 is like a catfish and is big, white, with meat on the back. Qin people call it otter fish.
鮠
